description.value: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes. You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Wall Jump]{Wall Jump} to make additional jumps off of creatures larger than you as if they were walls. Once per turn when you make an additional jump off of a creature in this way, you can also attempt to @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.Shove: Athletics]{Shove: Athletics} or @Macro[i4qGLVgXzQ4qfqZP]{Trip: Athletics} that creature as a free action.

source.value: Pathfinder Lost Omens: The Mwangi Expanse
